# EslyQurity SDK

The EslyQurity SDK is a JavaScript client library for integrating real-time security incident detection and communication into web applications.

It provides a lightweight interface for connecting to the EslyQurity backend, streaming sensor data, and receiving incident events over secure WebSocket connections.

## Installation
npm install esly-qurity-sdk

## Usage
import { EslyQurityClient } from "esly-qurity-sdk";

const client = new EslyQurityClient({
  apiKey: "YOUR_API_KEY",
  email:"YOUR_EMAIL",
  backendUrl: "https://api.eslyqurity.com",
});

await client.reportIncident({ audio: blob });

## Environment Notes

Designed for production-grade web applications

Works with standard browser APIs

Optimized for real-time event handling

Make sure you are using the correct configuration for your deployment environment.

## Documentation

Full documentation, configuration options, and integration guides are available at:

https://eslyqurity.com/docs
